title: Ep 73 | Socialists' Pandemic Power-Grab, Phil's Selfie Discovery, and the Kingdom of God Is Here!
description:
The coronavirus pandemic has taken dependence on government to a whole new level, and Phil says the socialist agenda right now is the scariest thing he's ever seen. Phil discovers selfies, and the look on his face as Jase fills him in is as funny as you'd think. And a lot of religious people are waiting for the Kingdom of God, but Phil, Jase, and Al make a rock-solid case that the Kingdom is here and we're a part of it.
https://Keeps.com/DOOR
